pkgmetadata.longdescription: # gps_encodingPython library, implemented in rust, including base functions for encoding of gps data. It is used to encode competitors data on https://www.routechoices.com## install ```pip install gps-encoding``````>> import gps_encoding>> gps_encoding.encode_data([(1628667993, 4.56543, -110.536214), ]) # [(time, lat, lon), ...]'qtaxyT}tzZhbtaT'>> gps_encoding.decode_data('qtaxyT}tzZhbtaT')[(1628...```# Warning: - The list of GPS points must be sorted by increasing timestamps.
